channel.title: Commands on Jenkins CLI
channel.description: Recent content in Commands on Jenkins CLI

item.title: jcli
item.description: jcli jcli 是帮助你管理多个 Jenkins 的工具 Synopsis jcli is Jenkins CLI which could help with your multiple Jenkins, Manage your Jenkins and your pipelines More information could found at https://jenkins-zh.cn jcli [flags] Options --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -h, --help help for jcli -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -v, --version 打印 Jenkins CLI 的版本 SEE ALSO jcli center - 管理你的 Jenkins 更新中心 jcli completion - 生成 bash 自动补全的脚本 jcli config - 管理 jcli 的配置 jcli crumb - Print crumbIssuer of Jenkins jcli doc - 为所有的 jcli 命令生成文档 jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins jcli open - Open your Jenkins with a browse jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件 jcli queue - Manage the queue of your Jenkins jcli restart - 重启 Jenkins jcli shell - 创建一个子 shell 使得对配置的修改保持在一个上下文中 jcli user - Print the user of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli center
item.description: jcli center 管理你的 Jenkins 更新中心 Synopsis 管理你的 Jenkins 更新中心 jcli center [flags] Options -h, --help help for center Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli - jcli 是帮助你管理多个 Jenkins 的工具 jcli center download - Download Jenkins jcli center mirror - 设置更新中心为一个镜像地址 jcli center upgrade - Upgrade your Jenkins jcli center watch - Watch your update center status

item.title: jcli center download
item.description: jcli center download Download Jenkins Synopsis Download Jenkins from a mirror site. You can get more mirror sites from https://jenkins-zh.cn/tutorial/management/mirror/ jcli center download [flags] Options -h, --help help for download --lts If you want to download Jenkins as LTS (default true) -m, --mirror string The mirror site of Jenkins (default "default") -o, --output string 输出的文件路径 (default "jenkins.war") -p, --progress If you want to show the download progress (default true) --war-version string 你希望下载的 Jenkins 版本 Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli center mirror
item.description: jcli center mirror 设置更新中心为一个镜像地址 Synopsis 设置更新中心为一个镜像地址 jcli center mirror [flags] Options --enable 你是否想要启动更新中心 (default true) -h, --help help for mirror --mirror-url string 更新中心的地址 (default "https://updates.jenkins-zh.cn/update-center.json") Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli center - 管理你的 Jenkins 更新中心

item.title: jcli center upgrade
item.description: jcli center upgrade Upgrade your Jenkins Synopsis Upgrade your Jenkins jcli center upgrade [flags] Options -h, --help help for upgrade Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli center - 管理你的 Jenkins 更新中心

item.title: jcli center watch
item.description: jcli center watch Watch your update center status Synopsis Watch your update center status jcli center watch [flags] Options --count int Count of watch (default 9999) -h, --help help for watch -i, --interval int Interval of watch (default 1) --util-install-complete The watch will be continue util all Jenkins plugins installation is completed --util-need-restart The watch will be continue util Jenkins needs restart Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli completion
item.description: jcli completion 生成 bash 自动补全的脚本 Synopsis 生成 bash 自动补全的脚本 jcli completion [flags] Examples # Installing bash completion on macOS using homebrew ## If running Bash 3.2 included with macOS brew install bash-completion ## or, if running Bash 4.1+ brew install bash-completion@2 ## you may need add the completion to your completion directory jcli completion > $(brew --prefix)/etc/bash_completion.d/jcli ## If you get trouble, please visit https://github.com/jenkins-zh/jenkins-cli/issues/83. Options -h, --help help for completion Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli config
item.description: jcli config 管理 jcli 的配置 Synopsis 管理 jcli 的配置 jcli config [flags] Examples jcli config generate jcli config list jcli config edit Options -h, --help help for config Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli - jcli 是帮助你管理多个 Jenkins 的工具 jcli config add - 增加一项 Jenkins 配置 jcli config edit - 编辑 Jenkins 配置 jcli config generate - 为你生成一份样本配置文件 jcli config list - 列出所有的 Jenkins 配置项 jcli config remove - Remove a Jenkins config jcli config select - Select one config as current Jenkins

item.title: jcli config add
item.description: jcli config add 增加一项 Jenkins 配置 Synopsis 增加一项 Jenkins 配置 jcli config add [flags] Examples jcli config add -n demo Options -d, --description string Description of the Jenkins -h, --help help for add -n, --name string Jenkins 的名称 -p, --proxy string Jenkins 的代理 -a, --proxyAuth string Jenkins 链接的代理认证 -t, --token string Jenkins 的令牌 --url string URL of the Jenkins -u, --username string Jenkins 的用户名 Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli config edit
item.description: jcli config edit 编辑 Jenkins 配置 Synopsis 编辑 Jenkins 配置 jcli config edit [flags] Options -h, --help help for edit Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli config - 管理 jcli 的配置

item.title: jcli config generate
item.description: jcli config generate 为你生成一份样本配置文件 Synopsis 为你生成一份样本配置文件 jcli config generate [flags] Options -c, --copy 拷贝输出到剪贴板 -h, --help help for generate -i, --interactive 交互模式 (default true) Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli config - 管理 jcli 的配置

item.title: jcli config list
item.description: jcli config list 列出所有的 Jenkins 配置项 Synopsis 列出所有的 Jenkins 配置项 jcli config list [flags] Options -h, --help help for list --no-headers When using the default output format, don't print headers (default print headers) -o, --output string Format the output, supported formats: table, json, yaml (default "table") Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli config - 管理 jcli 的配置

item.title: jcli config remove
item.description: jcli config remove Remove a Jenkins config Synopsis Remove a Jenkins config jcli config remove <name> [flags] Options -h, --help help for remove Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli config - 管理 jcli 的配置

item.title: jcli config select
item.description: jcli config select Select one config as current Jenkins Synopsis Select one config as current Jenkins jcli config select [<name>] [flags] Options -h, --help help for select Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli config - 管理 jcli 的配置

item.title: jcli crumb
item.description: jcli crumb Print crumbIssuer of Jenkins Synopsis Print crumbIssuer of Jenkins jcli crumb [flags] Options -h, --help help for crumb Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli - jcli 是帮助你管理多个 Jenkins 的工具

item.title: jcli doc
item.description: jcli doc 为所有的 jcli 命令生成文档 Synopsis 为所有的 jcli 命令生成文档 jcli doc <output dir> [flags] Options -h, --help help for doc Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli - jcli 是帮助你管理多个 Jenkins 的工具

item.title: jcli job
item.description: jcli job Manage the job of your Jenkins Synopsis Manage the job of your Jenkins Editing the pipeline job needs to install a plugin which is pipeline-restful-api https://plugins.jenkins.io/pipeline-restful-api Options -h, --help help for job -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli - jcli 是帮助你管理多个 Jenkins 的工具 jcli job artifact - 输出目标任务的归档文件列表 jcli job build - Build the job of your Jenkins jcli job create - Create a job in your Jenkins jcli job delete - Delete a job in your Jenkins jcli job edit - Edit the job of your Jenkins jcli job history - Print the history of job in your Jenkins jcli job input - Input a job in your Jenkins jcli job log - 输出任务的日志 jcli job param - Get parameters of the job of your Jenkins jcli job search - Print the job of your Jenkins jcli job stop - Stop a job build in your Jenkins jcli job type - Print the types of job which in your Jenkins

item.title: jcli job artifact
item.description: jcli job artifact 输出目标任务的归档文件列表 Synopsis 输出目标任务的归档文件列表 jcli job artifact <jobName> [buildID] [flags] Options -h, --help help for artifact --no-headers When using the default output format, don't print headers (default print headers) Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins jcli job artifact download - Download the artifact of target job

item.title: jcli job artifact download
item.description: jcli job artifact download Download the artifact of target job Synopsis Download the artifact of target job jcli job artifact download <jobName> [buildID] [flags] Options --download-dir string The directory which artifact will be downloaded -h, --help help for download -i, --id string ID of the job artifact --progress 是否显示进度条 (default true) Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job artifact - 输出目标任务的归档文件列表

item.title: jcli job build
item.description: jcli job build Build the job of your Jenkins Synopsis Build the job of your Jenkins. You need to give the parameters if your pipeline has them. Learn more about it from https://jenkins.io/doc/book/pipeline/syntax/#parameters. jcli job build <jobName> [flags] Options -b, --batch Batch mode, no need to confirm -h, --help help for build --param string Parameters of the job which is JSON format --param-entry stringArray Parameters of the job which are the entry format, for example: --param-entry name=value Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli job create
item.description: jcli job create Create a job in your Jenkins Synopsis Create a job in your Jenkins jcli job create <jobName> [flags] Options --copy string Copy an exists job -h, --help help for create --type string Which type do you want to create Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli job delete
item.description: jcli job delete Delete a job in your Jenkins Synopsis Delete a job in your Jenkins jcli job delete <jobName> [flags] Options -b, --batch Batch mode, no need confirm -h, --help help for delete Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli job edit
item.description: jcli job edit Edit the job of your Jenkins Synopsis Edit the job of your Jenkins. We only support to edit the pipeline job. jcli job edit <jobName> [flags] Options -f, --filename string Filename to files to use to replace pipeline -h, --help help for edit -s, --script string Script to use to replace pipeline. Use script first if you give filename at the meantime. --url string URL of the Jenkinsfile to files to use to replace pipeline Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli job history
item.description: jcli job history Print the history of job in your Jenkins Synopsis Print the history of job in your Jenkins jcli job history <jobName> [flags] Options -h, --help help for history --no-headers When using the default output format, don't print headers (default print headers) Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli job input
item.description: jcli job input Input a job in your Jenkins Synopsis Input a job in your Jenkins jcli job input <jobName> [buildID] [flags] Options --action string The action whether you want to process or abort. -h, --help help for input Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli job log
item.description: jcli job log 输出任务的日志 Synopsis Print the job’s log of your Jenkins It’ll print the log text of the last build if you don’t give the build id. jcli job log <jobName> [buildID] [flags] Options -h, --help help for log -s, --history int Specific build history of log (default -1) -i, --interval int Interval of watch (default 1) -w, --watch Watch the job logs Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli job param
item.description: jcli job param Get parameters of the job of your Jenkins Synopsis Get parameters of the job of your Jenkins jcli job param <jobName> [flags] Options -h, --help help for param --indent Output with indent --no-headers When using the default output format, don't print headers (default print headers) Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli job search
item.description: jcli job search Print the job of your Jenkins Synopsis Print the job of your Jenkins jcli job search [keyword] [flags] Options --all Print all items if there's no keyword -h, --help help for search --max int 输出的数量限制 (default 10) Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli job stop
item.description: jcli job stop Stop a job build in your Jenkins Synopsis Stop a job build in your Jenkins jcli job stop <jobName> [buildNumber] [flags] Options -b, --batch Batch mode, no need confirm -h, --help help for stop Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli job type
item.description: jcli job type Print the types of job which in your Jenkins Synopsis Print the types of job which in your Jenkins jcli job type [flags] Options -h, --help help for type Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") -o, --output string Format the output (default "json") SEE ALSO jcli job - Manage the job of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli open
item.description: jcli open Open your Jenkins with a browse Synopsis Open your Jenkins with a browse jcli open [config name] [flags] Examples jcli open -n <config name> Options -c, --config Open the configuration page of Jenkins -h, --help help for open -i, --interactive 交互模式 -n, --name string Open a specific Jenkins by name Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli plugin
item.description: jcli plugin 管理 Jenkins 的插件 Synopsis 管理 Jenkins 的插件 Examples jcli plugin list jcli plugin search github jcli plugin check Options -h, --help help for plugin Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli - jcli 是帮助你管理多个 Jenkins 的工具 jcli plugin check - 检查插件更新中心 jcli plugin create - 根据 Maven 骨架创建插件工程 jcli plugin download - 下载插件 jcli plugin install - 安装插件 jcli plugin list - 输出已经安装的插件 jcli plugin open - Open update center server jcli plugin search - 搜索插件 jcli plugin trend - Show the trend of the plugin jcli plugin uninstall - 卸载插件 jcli plugin upgrade - 升级指定插件 jcli plugin upload - 上传插件到你的 Jenkins

item.title: jcli plugin check
item.description: jcli plugin check 检查插件更新中心 Synopsis 检查插件更新中心 jcli plugin check [flags] Options -h, --help help for check Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件

item.title: jcli plugin create
item.description: jcli plugin create 根据 Maven 骨架创建插件工程 Synopsis Create a plugin project from the archetypes Plugin tutorial is here https://jenkins.io/doc/developer/tutorial/ jcli plugin create [flags] Options --debug-output If you want the maven output the debug info -h, --help help for create Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件

item.title: jcli plugin download
item.description: jcli plugin download 下载插件 Synopsis 下载插件及其依赖 jcli plugin download <keyword> [flags] Options -h, --help help for download --show-progress 你是否希望显示插件下载的进度 (default true) --skip-dependency 你是否想要跳过下载依赖插件 --skip-optional If you want to skip download optional dependency of plugin (default true) --use-mirror 你是否想要从镜像站点下载插件 (default true) Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件

item.title: jcli plugin install
item.description: jcli plugin install 安装插件 Synopsis Install the plugins Allow you to install a plugin with or without the version jcli plugin install [pluginName] [flags] Examples jcli plugin install localization-zh-cn jcli plugin install localization-zh-cn@1.0.9 Options -h, --help help for install --show-progress 你是否希望显示插件下载的进度 (default true) --suite string Suite of plugins --use-mirror 你是否想要从镜像站点下载插件 (default true) Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli plugin list
item.description: jcli plugin list 输出已经安装的插件 Synopsis 输出已经安装的插件 jcli plugin list [flags] Examples jcli plugin list --filter name=github jcli plugin list --filter hasUpdate jcli plugin list --no-headers Options --filter stringArray Filter for the list, like: active, hasUpdate, downgradable, enable, name=foo -h, --help help for list --no-headers When using the default output format, don't print headers (default print headers) -o, --output string Format the output, supported formats: table, json, yaml (default "table") Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli plugin open
item.description: jcli plugin open Open update center server Synopsis Open update center server jcli plugin open [flags] Options -h, --help help for open Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件

item.title: jcli plugin search
item.description: jcli plugin search 搜索插件 Synopsis 搜索插件 jcli plugin search <keyword> [flags] Options -h, --help help for search --no-headers When using the default output format, don't print headers (default print headers) -o, --output string Format the output, supported formats: table, json, yaml (default "table") Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件

item.title: jcli plugin trend
item.description: jcli plugin trend Show the trend of the plugin Synopsis Show the trend of the plugin jcli plugin trend <pluginName> [flags] Options -h, --help help for trend Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件

item.title: jcli plugin uninstall
item.description: jcli plugin uninstall 卸载插件 Synopsis 卸载插件 jcli plugin uninstall [pluginName] [flags] Options -h, --help help for uninstall Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件

item.title: jcli plugin upgrade
item.description: jcli plugin upgrade 升级指定插件 Synopsis 升级指定插件 jcli plugin upgrade [plugin name] [flags] Examples jcli plugin upgrade [tab][tab] Options --filter stringArray Filter for the list, like: name=foo -h, --help help for upgrade Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli plugin - 管理 Jenkins 的插件

item.title: jcli plugin upload
item.description: jcli plugin upload 上传插件到你的 Jenkins Synopsis 上传来自本地文件系统或者远程 URL 的插件到你的 Jenkins jcli plugin upload [flags] Examples jcli plugin upload --remote https://server/sample.hpi jcli plugin upload sample.hpi jcli plugin upload sample.hpi --show-progress=false Options -h, --help help for upload -r, --remote string 远程插件 URL --remote-jenkins string Remote Jenkins which will find from config list --remote-password string 远程插件的秘密 --remote-user string User of remote plugin URL --show-progress 是否显示上传进度 (default true) --skip-posthook 是否跳过后置命令钩子 --skip-prehook 是否跳过前置命令钩子 Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.

item.title: jcli queue
item.description: jcli queue Manage the queue of your Jenkins Synopsis Manage the queue of your Jenkins Options -h, --help help for queue Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.html -j, --jenkins string 选择本次执行的 Jenkins --logger-level string Logger level which could be: debug, info, warn, error (default "warn") SEE ALSO jcli - jcli 是帮助你管理多个 Jenkins 的工具 jcli queue cancel - Cancel the queue of your Jenkins jcli queue list - Print the queue of your Jenkins

item.title: jcli queue cancel

item.title: jcli queue list
item.description: jcli queue list Print the queue of your Jenkins Synopsis Print the queue of your Jenkins jcli queue list [flags] Options -h, --help help for list --no-headers When using the default output format, don't print headers (default print headers) -o, --output string Format the output, supported formats: table, json, yaml (default "table") Options inherited from parent commands --configFile string 指定另外一个配置文件 --debug Print the output into debug.
